name: doctype-monorepo-root
description: Root package for the Doctype monorepo

scripts.release: pnpm changeset version && pnpm changeset publish
scripts.docs:dev: pnpm run generate:sidebar && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: pnpm run generate:sidebar && vitepress build docs
scripts.docs:preview: pnpm run generate:sidebar && vitepress preview docs
